item.title: $250 Million Flows Out of Bankrupt Voyager Digital After Resuming Withdrawals
item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:
Last month on June 23, bankrupt crypto lender Voyager Digital allowed investors to start withdrawals, almost a year after shutting them down and filing for Chapter 11 bankruptcy. As per data from Dune Analytics, more than $250 million have flown out of the platform since then. After reopening withdrawals to users on June 23, Voyager

The post $250 Million Flows Out of Bankrupt Voyager Digital After Resuming Withdrawals appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Vitalik Buterin Proposes Scaling Solutions Like ZK Roll-ups for Bitcoin, Here’s Why
item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:
The world’s largest cryptocurrency Bitcoin (BTC) has cemented its position as a store of value, however, some crypto enthusiasts see the Bitcoin ecosystem as more than just a means of payment. Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin recently said that for Bitcoin to be more than just payments, it needs to adopt scaling solutions like ZK Roll-ups.

The post Vitalik Buterin Proposes Scaling Solutions Like ZK Roll-ups for Bitcoin, Here’s Why appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Terra Luna Classic To Expedite Community-Owned Station Wallet Infrastructure, LUNC Jumps
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Terra Luna Classic core developer Joint L1 Task Force (L1TF) submitted a proposal to create a community-owned wallet, which will be managed by the Terra Luna Classic (LUNC) community through governance. LUNC validator Happy Catty Crypto has submitted a similar proposal for voting to prioritize building wallet infrastructure and prevent privatization. Terra Luna Classic L1TF to Develop

The post Terra Luna Classic To Expedite Community-Owned Station Wallet Infrastructure, LUNC Jumps appeared first on CoinGape.
